titleStmt.title: A plaine and familiar explication (by way of paraphrase) of all the hard texts of the whole divine Scripture of the Old and Nevv Testament. By Ios. Exon
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Miles Flesher, for Nath: Butter, at the signe of the Pyde Bull at S. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: "A paraphrase vpon the hard texts of the New Testament" has separate pagination, register, and title page dated 1632.
The page after second p. 286 is numbered 291.
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
